<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Genie's Veil](/Spells.aspx?ID=783)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 236 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Bloodline**
[Genie](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=11)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** A creature within range is attacked.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

With a flourish, you fulfill a creature's wish for protection, bending reality to keep them from harm. The target vanishes in a burst of brightly colored smoke and sparkles, reappearing an instant later. They become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) against the triggering attack and until the end of the current creature's turn.
name: Genie's Veil
